channel.title: Need some PERSONAL feedback of server (Please Come)
channel.description:
hey guys well i think ive added basicly everything to the pking in my server, but i need like.... 5 testers to pk on it and give me PERSONAL feedback of what really needs to be done... if im correct ive covered about everything? So i need some testers.... BUT so i dont overload on people i am going to host it on hamachi :o.... All beta testers will recieve SUPERBANKS and 'Combat' skills of their choice. (PKING on my server has been commented the same as runescape almost):p
NOTE: This is being put in the 'Help' section not as advertising but as i have ran out of ideas. therefore need thoughruly personal ideas of people whom have played the server. I am not advertising anyway i do not plan to host it properly for a loooong time seeing as i have only worked on PKing.
P.S. 'SUPERBANKS' <---- Says it ALL lol took me awhile to make :p.
Hamachi Info: Network: sscape Password: 123
Umm if a mod insists on me not doing this please just ask me and ill change to sadly a list of features... asking for new ideas not listed.. thx...
Also add me on msn : josh.not.home@live.com.au
- Ancient Maul
Current Features List - Kbow Uses Kbolts - Proper Bow Farcasting(Dont take steps) - Wildy Levels - Extremely Updated :: players - 100% Ice/Blood Barrage - Perfect Vengeance - Veng Other-Non Wild Right Click Option - 100% Ancient Teles w/ delays + invulneribility - Perfect eating - PERFECT Magic Spell Queing - Saradomin Brews - Potions - Prayer Potions - 100% PERFECT PRAYER FINALLY - Perfect Range Bonus - Perfect Magic Splashes - PERFECT 100% BONUS' (126 with no equipment would never hit a 126 in full gear) - Ice Blitz Delay - Fixed the walking upto and doing nothing part with attacking - PRAYER BONUS'! - Ice Spells dont Re-Freeze - Ice spells now stop you exactly where you are even if your running - 100% Autocasting - Proper Items On Death(Keep equipment) - Working Glory (Edgeville) - Perfect Magic Timers - Perfect Eating Timers - Syncronized PKing Timers - Auto-Retaliate(on/off) - Proper Spell Runes for Completed Spells - "Attack" is replaced with "Vengeance" in non-wild - lvl 3 looters!!!!!!!!!! <--- LOL (lower levels left click higher levels in wild :o) - And like... lots more but to much to remember[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 04:52:31 am[/size][hr]zzz i need someone to reply

item.title: Need some PERSONAL feedback of server (Please Come)
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Maul Ancient Maul
item.description:
@Ancient_Maul wrote:

well ill be honest i cant host no-ip i think its my enviromental variables :s cuz everything else is fine (port forward was easy and done).

if u guys wanna play soemone paste pics/ the enviro value thingies cuz whatever tut i followd it dont work. and there is many ways to do them. So someone gimme there variables

item.title: Need some PERSONAL feedback of server (Please Come)
item.dc:creator: @CrnJacKer CrnJacKer
item.description:
@CrnJacKer wrote:

[quote=“Ancient Maul, post:1, topic:224553”]hey guys well i think ive added basicly everything to the pking in my server, but i need like… 5 testers to pk on it and give me PERSONAL feedback of what really needs to be done… if im correct ive covered about everything? So i need some testers… BUT so i dont overload on people i am going to host it on hamachi :o… All beta testers will recieve SUPERBANKS and ‘Combat’ skills of their choice. (PKING on my server has been commented the same as runescape almost)

NOTE: This is being put in the ‘Help’ section not as advertising but as i have ran out of ideas. therefore need thoughruly personal ideas of people whom have played the server. I am not advertising anyway i do not plan to host it properly for a loooong time seeing as i have only worked on PKing.

P.S. ‘SUPERBANKS’ <---- Says it ALL lol took me awhile to make :p.

Hamachi Info:
Network: sscape
Password: 123

Umm if a mod insists on me not doing this please just ask me and ill change to sadly a list of features… asking for new ideas not listed… thx…

Also add me on msn : josh.not.home@live.com.au

  • Ancient Maul

Current Features List

  • Kbow Uses Kbolts
  • Proper Bow Farcasting(Dont take steps)
  • Wildy Levels
  • Extremely Updated :: players
  • 100% Ice/Blood Barrage
  • Perfect Vengeance
  • Veng Other-Non Wild Right Click Option
  • 100% Ancient Teles w/ delays + invulneribility
  • Perfect eating
  • PERFECT Magic Spell Queing
  • Saradomin Brews
  • Potions
  • Prayer Potions
  • 100% PERFECT PRAYER FINALLY
  • Perfect Range Bonus
  • Perfect Magic Splashes
  • PERFECT 100% BONUS’ (126 with no equipment would never hit a 126 in full gear)
  • Ice Blitz Delay
  • Fixed the walking upto and doing nothing part with attacking
  • PRAYER BONUS’!
  • Ice Spells dont Re-Freeze
  • Ice spells now stop you exactly where you are even if your running
  • 100% Autocasting
  • Proper Items On Death(Keep equipment)
  • Working Glory (Edgeville)
  • Perfect Magic Timers
  • Perfect Eating Timers
  • Syncronized PKing Timers
  • Auto-Retaliate(on/off)
  • Proper Spell Runes for Completed Spells
  • “Attack” is replaced with “Vengeance” in non-wild
  • lvl 3 looters!!! <— LOL (lower levels left click higher levels in wild :o)
  • And like… lots more but to much to remember[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2008, 04:52:31 am[/size][hr]zzz i need someone to reply[/quote]

Sorry all for the long quote.

Also, first of all good server, but hamachi is never trusted or used lately,

you may also advertise at the moparscape status page instead of here, this is the wrong board to post.

-CrnJacKer

Read full topic
